title: A 'delicate' balance for Canada and a 'win-win' for Modi as Carney visits India
description: The two countries are repairing a strained relationship as they also seek to reduce their trade reliance on the US.
content:
Prime Minister Mark Carney is in India for a pivotal trip aimed at repairing ties with the world's largest democracy, as both countries seek to reduce their trade reliance on the US.

title: Resident Evil Requiem: how Capcom hopes to redefine survival horror
description: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.
content:
Thirty years ago, a game named Resident Evil ushered in the survival horror genre - a blend of nerve-shredding tension, elaborate puzzles, and intricate inventory management.

title: Brit Awards: Six things to look out for in tonight's ceremony
description: Will there be a tribute to Ozzy Osbourne? And will Taylor Swift break her losing streak?
content:
The biggest stars in pop and rock are gathering in Manchester ahead of the 46th edition of the Brit Awards.

title: Dual Gomes goals ensure Wolves beat Aston Villa and unwanted points record
description: Goals by João and Rodrigo Gomes dented Villa’s Champions League hopes as Wolves claimed a 2-0 win to beat the Premier League’s record low points total
content: As Wolves applied the seal to only their second Premier League victory of the season, Rodrigo Gomes doubling their lead over Aston Villa deep into second-half stoppage time, Rob Edwards hared down the touchline, yelling into the stands as his players... [3971 chars]

title: Target to stop selling cereals with synthetic colours
description: The US retailer's announcement follows commitments from several food companies to phase out artificial dyes.
content:
Target has said it will stop selling breakfast cereals that are made with synthetic colours by the end of May, marking the latest response by a retailer to backlash against ultra-processed foods.
